{{Infobox figure skater |name= Nathan Miller |image= |caption= |fullname= Nathan Miller |altname= |country= [[United States]] |formercountry= |birth_date= {{birth date and age|1988|7|18}} |birth_place= [[Little Rock, Arkansas]] |hometown= [[Colorado Springs, Colorado]] |residence= |death_date= |death_place= |height= {{height|ft=5|in=10}} |partner= '''[[Britney Simpson]]''' |formerpartner= Claire Davis, Ashlee Brown |coach= [[Dalilah Sappenfield]]
[[Laureano Ibarra]] |formercoach= |choreographer= [[Dalilah Sappenfield]]
[[Zuzanna Szwed]] |formerchoreographer= |skating club= [[Broadmoor SC]] |retired= |combined total= 144.80 |combined date= [[2009-2010 ISU Junior Grand Prix|2009 JGP Germany]] |SP score= 53.01 |SP date= [[2009-2010 ISU Junior Grand Prix|2009 JGP Germany]] |FS score= 91.79 |FS date= [[2009-2010 ISU Junior Grand Prix|2009 JGP Germany]] }} '''Nathan Miller''' (born July 18, 1988 in [[Little Rock, Arkansas]]) is an [[United States|American]] [[pair skater]]. With partner [[Britney Simpson]], he is the 2010 [[United States Figure Skating Championships|U.S. junior silver medalist]]. They placed 6th at the [[2009-2010 ISU Junior Grand Prix Final]]. {{As of|2010|12|11}}, the pair has the season's 20th highest total score.{{cite web | url = http://www.isuresults.com/isujsstat/sb2010-11/sbtspto.htm | title = ISU Judging System - Season Bests Total Scores 2010/2011 | publisher = [[International Skating Union]]}} {{As of|2010|12|14}}, the [[International Skating Union]] (ISU) ranks them 26th in the world.{{cite web | url = http://www.isuresults.com/ws/ws/wspairs.htm | title = ISU World Standings for Figure Skating and Ice Dance : Pairs | publisher = [[International Skating Union]] | date = 14 December 2010 | accessdate = 5 January 2011 }} ==Competitive highlights== ===Pairs=== (with Davis) {| class="wikitable" |- !
